content.rendered:
As our name suggests, we know a thing or two about auto parts. Whether you are in need of an auto part, or are looking for a project car, or want to get cash on the spot for your junk car, Aero Auto Parts is here to help.
While you may be familiar with our auto parts business, we’d like to take a moment to highlight our sister business, Frank’s Auto Glass. Frank’s Auto Glass can assist you with auto glass repair and replacement, power or manual window and lock repair, and mobile windshield repair.
Auto Glass
Have a chip or crack in your windshield? Don’t wait to get it fixed. A small break can turn into a much bigger and more expensive problem. Our expert staff can repair, replace, and install custom glass for your auto.
Power or Manual Window and Lock Repair
If you are experiencing problems with your windows rolling up or down or your locks are not functioning properly, call Frank’s Auto Glass today for fast and friendly service.
Mobile Repair
No time to come in for a repair? We’ll come to you and make your auto glass repair as painless as possible. It’s also safer for you not to drive especially when you have compromised glass in need of a repair.
Did we mention that our work also comes with a 1 year workmanship warranty? Bring our car down to Frank’s Auto Glass located 6341 South Wentworth Avenue. You may also call 773-483-2626.
